title: China Financial Services : Fin Services vice-chairman Chan Yuk Ming quits
content:
] China Financial Services (00605) said Chan Yuk 
 
Ming has resigned as a non-executive director and vice-chairman with effect from today 
 
since he wishes to spend more time on his personal business development. 
 
Chan has confirmed that he has no disagreement with the Board. 
 
 Zhang Xiaobin and Huang Mei has been appointed as a non-executive director with effect 
 
from today.  (HL)
